# Determine parameter values for model

```{r}
acid.pars
```


```{r}
median(acid.pars$man.ph.r1)
median(acid.pars$man.ph.r3)
median(acid.pars$man.ph.r1) - sd(acid.pars$man.ph.r1)/sqrt(nrow(acid.pars)) * 1.356
median(acid.pars$man.ph.r3) - sd(acid.pars$man.ph.r3)/sqrt(nrow(acid.pars)) * 1.356
```

DK only (so only field acidification)

```{r}
dd <- subset(acid.pars, country == 'DK')
dd
median(dd$man.ph.r1)
median(dd$man.ph.r3)
median(dd$man.ph.r1) - sd(dd$man.ph.r1)/sqrt(nrow(dd)) * 1.356
median(dd$man.ph.r3) - sd(dd$man.ph.r3)/sqrt(nrow(dd)) * 1.356
```

```{r}
mean(dd$man.ph.r1)
mean(dd$man.ph.r3)
mean(dd$man.ph.r1) - sd(dd$man.ph.r1)/sqrt(nrow(dd)) * 1.356
mean(dd$man.ph.r3) - sd(dd$man.ph.r3)/sqrt(nrow(dd)) * 1.356
```
